preqs: Students must have passed one of the following: AFC2140, BFC2140, AFC1100 (pre 2009) and AFC2100 (pre 2009) before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFC1100, AFC2100, AFC2140, BFB2631, BFC2140, BFF2631, BFG2631, BFP2631, BFW2631} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFC1100, AFC2100, AFC2140, BFB2631, BFC2140, BFF2631, BFG2631, BFP2631, BFW2631} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: Topics include asset classes and returns, portfolio theory, asset pricing models, security valuation processes and techniques, market efficiency and behavioural finance, portfolio performance evaluations, hedge funds and the CFA Institute code of ethics and standards of professional conduct.
